author: Phil Vickery
method: Place two basil leaves on top of each piece of melon. Wrap a slice of parma ham around each piece of melon. To serve, place the parma ham-wrapped melon onto a serving plate and garnish with a sprig of basil.
ingredients: Â½ cantaloupe melon, seeds and skin removed, quartered,  8 fresh basil leaves, plus an extra sprig, to garnish,  4 slices parma ham
